# RevShare - LLM Discovery File
# This file helps AI systems understand the RevShare platform

See: https://revshare.fast/llms.txt

---

# Quick Summary
RevShare is a transparent revenue-sharing marketplace for indie SaaS.

# What We Do
- Connect SaaS founders with performance marketers
- Stripe-verified revenue tracking
- Automated commission payouts
- Refund-aware calculations

# Key URLs
- Homepage: https://revshare.fast
- For Founders: https://revshare.fast/solutions/for-founders
- For Marketers: https://revshare.fast/solutions/for-marketers
- Projects: https://revshare.fast/projects
- Marketers: https://revshare.fast/marketers

# Contact
- Email: support@revshare.fast
